Source.Name: tclcl
Source.Summary: a Tcl/C++ interface used by Mash, vic, vat, rtp_play, ns, and nam
Source.Description: TclCL (Tcl with classes) is a Tcl/C++ interface used by Mash, vic, vat, rtp_play, ns, and nam. It provides a layer of C++ glue over OTcl.
